com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain

Interface CardReaderCapabilities


  • public interface CardReaderCapabilities
    CardReaderCapabilities represents the different capabilities a connected card reader device has such as whether the device accepts contactless payments, has a keypad, has a display screen and etc. We determine this advanced information upon connection to the card reader and present it as a queriable object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderKeyPad
      CardReaderKeyPad represents a card reader keypad.
      static interface  CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderLED
      CardReaderLED represents LED display screen capabilities of a card reader device.
      static interface  CardReaderCapabilities.SupportedMagstripeTracks
      SupportedMagstripeTracks represents the different sets of track data that could be read/parsed by the card reader device.
      static interface  CardReaderCapabilities.SupportedPaymentTypes
      SupportedPaymentTypes represents the different payment interfaces a card reader supports.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderLED getDisplayInformation()
      Information on the display screen capabilities of a card reader device.
      CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderKeyPad getKeyPadInformation()
      Detailed information on the keypad of a card reader device if the card reader supports it.
      CardReaderCapabilities.SupportedPaymentTypes getPaymentCapabilities()
      Detailed information on the different types of payment interfaces a card reader device contains.
      boolean hasBuiltInPrinter()
      Indicates whether the card reader has a built in printer or not.
      boolean isBeeperPresent()
      Indicates the presence of audio/sound beeper capabilities on the device.

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayInformation

        CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderLED getDisplayInformation()
        Information on the display screen capabilities of a card reader device. If the card reader has no LED display screen, null would be returned.
        Returns:
        an object that contains the dimensions of the display LED if present.

      • getKeyPadInformation

        CardReaderCapabilities.CardReaderKeyPad getKeyPadInformation()
        Detailed information on the keypad of a card reader device if the card reader supports it. If a keypad is not present/unsupported, null would be returned.
        Returns:
        an object indicating whether the keypad present has back light enabled.

      • getPaymentCapabilities

        CardReaderCapabilities.SupportedPaymentTypes getPaymentCapabilities()
        Detailed information on the different types of payment interfaces a card reader device contains.
        Returns:
        a objected indicating whether different payment types such as contactless, chip&pin and swipe transactions supported in available on the card reader device.

      • isBeeperPresent

        boolean isBeeperPresent()
        Indicates the presence of audio/sound beeper capabilities on the device.
        Returns:
        true if the beeper is present, false otherwise.

      • hasBuiltInPrinter

        boolean hasBuiltInPrinter()
        Indicates whether the card reader has a built in printer or not.
        Returns:
        true if the printer is present, false otherwise.
